query: Novato Childrens Dentistry Novato CA usa
name: Novato Pediatric Dentistry

reviews_data.review_text: They do a great job and work really well with children. My 4 year old child had his first x-ray and cleaning today. They kept him at ease.  They made it an enjoyable experience.  Really nice dentist and staff.  We love the beautiful fish tank too!  It really helps calm my child before and after the visit. It's really important to me that my child has the best experience possible going to the dentist and they really nailed it.  A lot of detail went into giving that to him from the wonderful staff to the way the entire dentist office is set up. I was impressed.  I highly recommend them!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're really touched by your kind words, Angela! It makes us happy to know your little one had a good experience with us and that he loved the fish tank! We work hard to create a friendly and relaxing environment, so your feedback means a lot. Thanks for recommending us!

reviews_data.review_text:
Emergency service for our 7 year old.

I can't say enough wonderful things.

Our 7 year old daughter had a bike accident where she fell on her face and and her front permanent tooth came out. It was a super traumatic experience for her and especially for our family. This was after hours on a Tuesday. I called the line and was told someone would get in touch. Martina called us back and took information about our daughter and said she would get back to us once she spoke to the doctor ( this was around 8:45PM ). At 9PM my phone goes to do not disturb, she tried every way to reach us because every minute counts with getting the tooth back in.
Dr.Robinson then leaves text and voicemails and says that he is headed to the office and will wait hoping, we see his message. My mom heart melted and was so emotional that people cared and wanted to help our daughter so much.  Jennifer who was the assistant the night of the incident was so amazing!  My daughter was so afraid but Dr. Robinson and Jennifer made her feel safe. Preparing that the bill would be something outrageous, it was super reasonable and the staff is very transparent about billing. This is much appreciated.

I love this practice so much!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your experience, Amanda! We're grateful for the opportunity to assist your daughter during such a challenging time. Your kind words mean the world to us!

reviews_data.review_text: First and for most I had a great experience at Novato pediatric everyone there was super welcoming they made my daughter experience great. I went in for a GA consult and everything went great consult was super  thorough the doctor answered all my questions and concern. Martina went over treatment with me and explained what my insurance covered and what didn't cover and let me know what portion I'm responsible for and will have to pay on the day of Treatment. The day of her GA surgery date again I was welcomed in they made sure to make my daughter feel confortable Before starting the treatment. Over all I'm so happy with my experience here and will continue to bring my daughter in as a patient.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us! We're delighted to hear that you and your daughter felt welcomed and comfortable throughout the process. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to seeing you both again as patients.

reviews_data.review_text: Took my 2 year old for a cleaning and I was a bit nervous on how he would do. The office space captured his attention and I could see he felt comfortable. All of the staff was great and very friendly! The cleaning was quick and he loved it. So happy to have this dental office in town!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're delighted your little one felt comfortable and enjoyed the cleaning! Thank you for sharing your experience with us!

reviews_data.review_text: Both my girls had exams, X-rays and cleanings today. Novato Pediatric Dentistry took such good care of them. They explained information thoroughly and took great care. The office is super clean and kid friendly. My girls got to watch tv while having their teeth cleaned and got tokens at the end to get a little something from the machines in the front lobby. I definitely would recommend their care and we will be back in six months!  Thank you Novato Pediatric! 😊
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for trusting us with your girls' dental care! We're delighted to hear they had a positive experience. Looking forward to seeing you all again in six months!

reviews_data.review_text: Dr. Robinson, Leslie and the whole team at Novato Pediatric Dentistry are excellent! My 19 month son had his first visit yesterday and to my surprise it went extremely well!  The waiting room was amazing, providing plenty of activities to keep my little one busy. Highly recommend this fantastic dental practice for kids!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Jeannine! We're so glad you and your son had a great experience at Novato Pediatric Dentistry. We appreciate your recommendation!

reviews_data.review_text: My three young kids (6,4 and 2 years old) had the best first experience at the dentist! The staff is extremely friendly and the environment is very inviting and fun. From beginning to end it was wonderful. I would highly recommend Novato Pediatric Dentistry  to anyone. My kids and I look forward to coming back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're delighted your kids had a fantastic first visit with us! Looking forward to seeing your family again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: They are very patient and very excellent care with my son. The dental hygienist was amazing and the dentist himself was also Good. All the staff communicated effectively and efficiently and I will be definitely bringing my son back there
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your kind words, Roland! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing your son again!

reviews_data.review_text: We loved our experience at Novato pediatric dentistry! They were so calm and caring to my daughter and she felt so comfortable getting her xrays and teeth cleaning. She also keeps telling everyone in our family that she can't wait to go back next time to get another prize! Thanks for a great experience.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Roxane! We're glad your daughter had a great experience and felt comfortable during her visit. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to seeing you both again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Beware of shady office manager! I preface this by saying all other team members were pleasant...I was initially quoted at $9000 for my 3 yr old son at which point during consultation I asked "is financing available?" They reassured Yes it is! Ok cool I'll do business. Fast forward a month later they call to let me know a next day 10am appointment is suddenly available with an anesthesiologist on board. They said if I couldn't take it, I couldn't my son in for months unfortunately. I asked before hand can you please tell me what portion outside of my insurance I will be quoted at...office manage states her computer isn't working...I said I'm patient I can wait I do not want to commit to something I cannot afford. 5 minutes later she quotes me at $2700 and some change that included a 20% discount. I took the appointment... they said an anesthesiologist would be sending an email with instructions...the email never arrived. I was only instructed on such short notice, no food 9 hrs before the 10am said appointment. The next morning they called at 8:45 asking if I could come in early since they were ahead of schedule, I agreed and arrived 30 min early due to living in Santa Rosa. No biggie! Upon arrival a woman who I've never seen before brings out the paperwork with the quote of 2700 and says all we need is to slide your card and he's good to go! I say "okay how much am I being charged today"? She says the full amount. To my surprise I tell her I do not have that full amount, I was told that I could finance. She tells me she's the office manager and they "DO NOT" finance payments what so ever. And no one would have told me that. She then asks how much could I do today and I tell her $500 and she says that's not enough. She then proceeds to tell me she will not be arguing with me about payments in front of other customers in the lobby then turns around and sees it's just us and the receptionist.....Odd how worried she was about the way she looked....She rudely says I can go somewhere else at which point I obliged. Then 15 min later as I'm on the freeway home she has the audacity to call me and ask if I could come back and that they would accept my 500$ payment today.  I laughed and declined because she was obviously very desperate, the call back was quite pathetic. Take your business elsewhere don't be fooled by the fancy fishtanks!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you so much for sharing your experience. I totally understand how frustrating this may have been. First and foremost I would like to start by saying I did not look at this as an opportunity to treat your son as business. 

We are a safe and caring organization were we are respected and valued within the community. Our goal is to treat every patient and their families with empathy, understanding and respect. 

Now to address your complaints. Yes we absolutely have financing available and that is Carecredit which we mentioned during your consultation and again at the time of the appointment. 

Our office policy is as follows we collect payment at the time of the appointment. This policy has been in place since the organization began.

When we consulted you and your 3 year old son the soonest date available would have been in May but because we were able to organize an additional surgery date we reach out to a few parents and offered them the option to come in sooner, so yes it was very last minute but it was definitely enough time to follow the NPO orders. 

When we schedule these types of appointments we always inform the parent that the arrival time may change base on the events that take place during the day. We cannot 100% guarantee start times. 

I then offered other options allowing you to not have to pay anything at all and to bill your insurance but you declined. 

Once you stormed out we decided to call you back because I wanted to give your son the opportunity and care that he truly needs. We scheduled a spot for him that may not be available again until a few months out. 

Again I apologize for the confusion and I appreciate your feedback.

reviews_data.review_text: I went here for my child’s first dentist appointment and was very happy with all of the staff. My child was extremely nervous and scared and they were so helpful easing her into her first visit. They are very experienced and have great techniques in working with children.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for choosing us for your child's first dentist appointment! We're glad our staff could help ease her nerves and make her feel comfortable. We pride ourselves on our experience and techniques with children.

reviews_data.review_text: I started taking my daughter when she was 1 and I can’t imagine taking her anywhere else. They are extremely friendly and make my daughter absolutely love going to the dentist. We chose to have her teeth cleaned every 3 months - not because anything is wrong, but because she loves it so much and I figure the more regular cleanings the better! All staff and dentists are such a delight. They always give my daughter a bag of goodies and a coin so she can get a toy from their machines on the way out. They also play Disney plus throughout the procedure making it a breeze!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words and loyalty! We truly appreciate your trust in us and we're delighted to hear that your daughter enjoys coming to the dentist. We love making her visits fun and enjoyable. Looking forward to seeing you both again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: An exceptionally friendly staff, who has taken great care of my three kids. They made cleanings easy, and when extra dental was required they explained the process and were very caring making it less scary for even my 7 year old.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're glad to hear that our staff was able to make your kids' dental experience a positive one. We appreciate your feedback!

reviews_data.review_text: The doctor and staff are all great! They never make us wait.  My kids actually like going there because they get to watch movies and get a goody bag at the end of the appointment.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for your kind words, Maha! We're so glad to hear that your kids enjoy their visits with us. Can't wait to see you all again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great office! The dentist and dental assistants were kind and gentle. All staff members were great communicators, friendly and very professional. The office was clean and my children absolutely loved the entire set up. From the cool shades they got to wear and the smart TVs on the ceiling to the to go goodie bags and the coins for toy section at the end of the visit. Thank you for the great experience!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're so glad you and your children enjoyed your visit! Thank you for the kind words and for choosing our office.

reviews_data.review_text: We love Novato Pediatric Dentistry! Our daughter loves the staff and Dr. Robinson is awesome with kids! Friendly staff, nice building and clean with fish tanks and tvs for the kiddos (if permitted by their parents).
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words, Sabrina! We're delighted your daughter loves our staff and that Dr. Robinson has been awesome with her. We appreciate your feedback on our friendly staff, nice building, and clean environment. We hope to see you and your family again soon!

reviews_data.review_text:
They are always so kind and compassionate with all three of my children over the years. The gals at the front desk always greet us with a smile and we never have to wait more than 5 min before there name is called to be seen. The dental assistants communicate everything they are doing and what to expect. I really appreciate that they all are very warm with my kiddos. Sometimes they can be nervous but they know how to keep them comfy while getting there cleaning etc.
My children enjoy the dental goodies after and that’s the whip cream on the cake.
Definitely recommend them.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words and for entrusting us with the care of your children. We truly appreciate your recommendation and are grateful for your support.

reviews_data.review_text: Doctor and staff are great to work with. They take great care of my kids and make them feel comfortable during each appointment. We are very happy with our experience.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words, Sandra! We truly appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you and your kids had a great experience with our doctor and staff.

reviews_data.review_text: Friendly staff, nice doctor. Very thorough explanation. My kids love the fish tanks and the prizes at the end.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for appreciating our friendly staff and thorough explanations! We're glad your kids enjoy the fish tanks and prizes too!

reviews_data.review_text: Everything about Novato Pediatric Dentistry is great - they are super friendly, knowledgeable, efficient with scheduling (especially with families and multiple kids), have great technology and send great reminders. Couldn't ask for anything more. My kids literally love going to to dentist!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Stephanie! We're grateful for your kind words and thrilled to hear that your kids love coming to our office.

reviews_data.review_text: We love Novato Pediatric Dentistry! We moved to Santa Rosa but loved NPD so much we make the drive every 6 months. The staff is always helpful, friendly, gentle and warm! My daughter absolutely loves coming to the dentist and that’s 100% due to the staff and doctors!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words, Brie! We truly appreciate your loyalty and the effort you put into bringing your daughter to our practice. It means the world to us knowing that our staff and doctors have made such a positive impact on her dental experience.

reviews_data.review_text: Dr. Meekay and the staff were very friendly for my son’s first appointment. He was a bit scared but they were so kind and accommodating for him. Thank you!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We're so glad to hear that your son felt comfortable during his first appointment. Thank you for sharing your experience!

reviews_data.review_text: We love Dr. Robinson and his staff. The ladies make the whole process stress free and my daughters love going to the dentist! Dr. Robinson is gentle and very proficient in the work he does. Thank you!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're grateful to have you and your daughters as part of our dental family.

reviews_data.review_text: We are so thankful for the staff and doctors at Novato Pediatric Dentist! They are so kind, efficient, thoughtful, and welcoming. My children love coming to get their teeth cleaned, and I greatly appreciate their excellent care.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Nicole! We're grateful for your kind words and are glad to hear that your children enjoy their visits. We strive to provide excellent care and a welcoming environment.

reviews_data.review_text: Dr. Robinson is the best. He is kind and gentle and my kids adore him. Feel very lucky to have such a great practice so close to home.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Amy! We truly appreciate your kind words and are so grateful to have you and your kids as part of our practice.

reviews_data.review_text: Just finished our 2nd visit. Kids are 6, 4 and almost 2. I am so pleased I found this place. It’s easy to make an appt. They always accommodate seeing my kids at the same time. They are kind and patient. My children are happy when they leave and so am I.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for choosing our clinic for your kids' dental visits! We're delighted to hear that your second visit was just as positive as the first. We always strive to make scheduling convenient and ensure that your children are seen together. It's wonderful to know that both you and your kids leave happy.

reviews_data.review_text: Always enjoy coming with my little guy. They are extremely patient and know how to cheer him up when feeling nervous or anxious.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your 5-star rating! We truly appreciate your support.

reviews_data.review_text: First time taking my girls, they were amazing. Friendly, super helpful and really checked their teeth and gave a great cleaning.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Nicole! We're so glad you and your girls had a great experience with us.

reviews_data.review_text:
Our entire experience here was wonderful. From the moment we entered, the front office staff was very kind and welcoming. They directed the experience more toward my son and I really appreciated that. The hygienist, Jose, was also really nice and made sure to make me and my son comfortable while he X-rayed and cleaned his teeth. He did a phenomenal job doing so and he also gave my son and I pointers on caring for his teeth at home.  Dr. Robinson came over after and examined my son’s teeth. He introduced himself and had a really kind and caring energy. After he examined his teeth, he told me about his observations, his plan of action and recommendations. In the end, my son got a prize. He was so excited and over all, had a really amazing visit!

Bonus: the esthetics of the office and dental room/beds we very soothing, modern and hygienic. They even have TV’s over head with headphones so the kids can watch Disney movies if they’d like to while their teeth get cleaned!

I highly recommend Dr. Robinson and his team to any parent looking for a pediatric dentist!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Michelle! We're thrilled you and your son had a wonderful visit. Our team truly cares about creating a positive and comfortable experience for our young patients. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to seeing you both again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Novato Pediatric Dentistry is the best! Everyone is very nice, warm and welcoming. Both dentists are very kind and gentle with my three kids (12, 9 and 5). Would highly recommend them.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We love to see the children smile and have a wonderful experience. Thank you for trusting us to take care of your children's dental needs. We will see you in six months. :)

reviews_data.review_text: My son had a great experience with the dentist and Martina was a great help with my first experience at Novato Pediatric Dentistry.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Isaac! We're so glad your son had a great experience with the dentist and that Martina was a great help during your first visit to Novato Pediatric Dentistry.

reviews_data.review_text:
We love the team here. They really know how to make kids feel comfortable!

Very impressed how they educate my children on proper tooth care.  My kids actually like to go here.

This is a very nice place! Both my kids go here and we have had a very good experience. The staff was very nice with my 5 year old and 2 year old. For my 2 year old, they brought us to a private room that is more comfortable and a lot less scary than a dental seat. They do not have you hold ur kid down and they are very sensitive to the young kid needs regarding sense of safety.
Would recommend it 100%.
reviews_data.owner_answer: This makes us so happy to hear! Thank you so much for your kinds words! Thank you for allowing us to take care of your childrens dental needs! We appreciate you!! :)

reviews_data.review_text:
Took my 20 month old for first visit. It was painless thanks to these awesome people! Clean and inviting lobby, private room for toddler exam. Cute token to be redeemed from prize machine at the end. Will return and recommend!

*Edit: had our 2nd appointment with my now 26 month old and am going to tell all of my parent friends how amazing they are! If we keep this up, my kid might actually like going to the dentist haha
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you! We are thrilled to hear this!!! see you all in 6 months. :)

reviews_data.review_text: Staff are friendly and prompt. The facilities is very clean and kid-friendly. My kids love going to the dentist.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We appreciate your kind words and are happy to hear that our staff and facilities have made a positive impression on you and your children. Thank you for choosing us as your dentist!

reviews_data.review_text:
Visited twice in the last week since both my kids had appointments.

The office has changed ownership since our last checkups and we were very happy to see that the experience has not changed at all. The staff is super-friendly and great with younger children. We met with Dr. Robinson and he’s got great bedside manner.

The space is welcoming, super-clean, and has cheery decorations all over. Great for kids who may have dental anxieties.

One thing they do that I wish more medical offices did is using text messaging and email to confirm appointments. It makes it so much easier than worrying about calling back to confirm in the middle of a workday.

Highly recommend this practice!
We have had a good experience at this dentist. Will continue to receive care here in the future.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Jon! We're so glad to hear that you've had a positive experience at our dentist office. Looking forward to taking care of you in the future!

reviews_data.review_text: Love Novato Pediatric Dentistry! Friendly and helpful staff, and great hours.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Sara! We appreciate your kind words and are glad to hear that you love our friendly staff and convenient hours.

reviews_data.review_text: I have four children that have regular follow up dental care here. They are professional, quick, and make the experience for children so wonderful. Most recently, my son had an accident and injured his permanent tooth. This office was quick to get him an appointment and repaired it without any trouble and made sure my son was informed and I was reassured throughout the entire process. Would highly recommend them to any and all!!

What an upgrade. My family had gone here under the previous owners. Being candid the work was good but the customer service was abhorrent and life is too short to deal with people that act that way.

With there being new owners we decided to give it another shot (it turns out there aren't a lot of pediatric dentists in Marin and if things had been fixed it would save us enough travel time to matter).

I am extremely happy to report that everything today was smooth, friendly and that cleanings and x-rays were even done earlier than expecting. A massive difference from the previous unpleasant regime.

Amazing facility from front door to back. Open and inviting waiting room; kid friendly. Professional and friendly staff. My kids (5 and 9 years of age) felt comfortable with every stage from X-rays, cleaning and even a filling. The hygienist and doctor talk to me and my kids like friends not just patients. And of course my kids loved watching movies during their cleaning and filling. Thank you NPD for making something that could be scary, into something enjoyable.
Welcoming to little kids. Staff are great with the little ones to make their first experience with dentist a good one.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Susan! We're glad to hear that our staff made your little one's first dental visit a positive one.

reviews_data.review_text: My 3 year old son has gone there 2 times. Each time we have had a great experience. We had to reschedule and Karla was very sweet she remembered us and was able to get him reschedule right away.  Both times we have been there Jennifer and Miziel were so sweet and made him feel so comfortable he wanted to go back the next day. Highly recommended.

Absolutely great pediatric dentistry office. Everyone from the dental hygienists to the dentists are polite to the parents, communicate effectively, and are marvelous with the kids. I have never seen a kid there look frightened or upset about being there. My kids B(5) and B(7) look forward to going. At first I was bummed that they are the nearest office that I could find that accepts military insurance because it is a bit of a drive to get there, but not anymore. I wish all peds dentist offices where like Novato Pediatric Dentistry.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow. We are so happy to hear you all had such a wonderful experience! this is exactly how we want all of our families to feel. Thank you so much for the nice words. We will see you all soon. :)

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing experience for my 3 year old. She actually had a good time at the dentist! The gal helping us was very friendly, super patient! She really took her time explaining, directly to my toddler, what she was going to be doing BEFORE she did it. I personally feel this is important when working with kids, so I really appreciated that!

Dental office assistants Jennifer, Misael and Yessa and dentists are so great with my children. Very helpful  friendly staff. Karla was great help in answering my insurance questions. Been going to then since my kids were toddlers. Over 13 years!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Thank you so much for the kind words!! It was so nice to see you all again. We appreciate you and the children. Until next time!
With Gratitude,
The team at Novato Pediatric Dentistry

reviews_data.review_text: Did a good job with a tooth pull but surprised me with extra charges after the procedure.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi, Colette! Thank you so much for your review! we appreciate your feedback. We apologize for what seemed like a  surprised charge. after reviewing your account it looks like because we added your secondary insurance right before the appointment, we were unable to have a full breakdown of the insurance before we started. I know this can be frustrating and I do apologize for that. I will be sure to let my front staff know to explain that their may be a cost difference especially when the insurance hasn't been fully verified.  Next time please keep in mind we can always do pre-auth before any procedure to get the exact amount and if you have new insurance please be sure to update the information before hand to obtain an accurate estimate. Thank you so much for trusting us with your dental needs. we will see you all soon.

reviews_data.review_text: My son with DS has trouble with procedures due to having open heart surgery. He can get a lot of anxiety. The team handled it great. Allowed me to work with my child to help him ( parents who have children with disabilities usually know exactly what to do better than most). They also respected my method as I've worked with his therapists since he was born and understand the behavioral interventions he needs in order to help him. I was really impressed. They adjusted to his needs and we were able to do a short exam. They were willing learners . We will continue trying as it's so important for my child to learn to allow a dentist to check his teeth and do a cleaning. It's just going to take longer for him to allow it. I really love their understanding and adjusting their dental care plan to my childs needs. The team was open to learning about the way he adjusts and it was amazing. Very few medical facilities or dental facilities really take the time to understand what children with disabilities need and ate willing to learn from the parent. Most take over and act as if they know more about your child and it causes our kids to not have a good experience.  Each childs needs are different.  Grateful mom.
Great experience! My kids felt very safe and at ease with the assistant and dentist! Thank you for that!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so glad to hear that you had a great experience with our office. Thank you for choosing us for your child's dental care needs!

reviews_data.review_text: Everything about this office is great! My son is only two, but absolutely loves coming to the dentist. He loves the fish in the waiting room, the prizes at the end, and the staff are so kind and great with kiddos. I highly recommend NPD!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so happy to hear he enjoyed his dental visit with us!!!! See you soon.
